name: My Zone
description: My Zone was a Project developed during my final year at college in Traun. We created custom NFC Cards which stored contact information like Social Media Links or Websites. The user can read and write his personal card and share it with others via NFC.

name: Velo
description: Velo was a school project in 4th grade at the higher technical college in Traun. This cross platform mobile app developed with Ionic was used to track the users location while he was travelling with a bike. At the end of his run the app calculates the driven distance, the CO2 emissions compared to the emissions of a car.

name: Unchef
description: Unchef Recipes is my personal Cross Platform App developed with React Native. It started early 2020 with my brother, who is developing the backend of the platform. It is still under development and a it should be available for the public later this year (2024). Unchef is a collection of recipes managed by the Community. You can learn more about existing features at https://www.unchef.app

name: Metria Robots
description: Metria was an Android App developed for a robotic arm, which was my final year thesis. This Hybrid Ionic App connects to the Robot Arm via Bluetooth and the user can control each joint of the arm with an intuitive user interface. The project was marked with an A and the app is fully compatible with the self-printed arm.

name: HusqPDF
description: HusqPDF is an open source, serverside rendered pdf generation toolkit. It provides an engine, ui and design elements to a Nuxt application specifically configured for PDF generation. It allows you to structure, design and build pdf with web standards like HTML, CSS and JavaScript. It also comes with print-optimized Vue components like pages, footers and headers to help developers handle printed media inside a webpage. Checkout the source code on github.com and npm
